content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services. May I have your name to get started?
Thank you, Bob! Can I get your address so I can confirm you are in our service area and assist you further?
Great, thank you! What kind of plumbing issue are you experiencing, and when would you ideally like someone to come out and take a look?
Well, just a small leak under the sink. I’m actually still checking with a couple of other companies to get some quotes first. Can I get back to you?
Absolutely, Bob! Please feel free to reach back out when you’re ready, and we’ll be happy to help. If you’d like an estimate or have any other questions, let me know any time.
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies first.
